snippet: A New York man was being held without bail on terrorism charges after federal authorities said he was prepared to strap on a bomb and sacrifice himself for jihad and persistently tried to join the Islamic State or another extremist group in Syria....

headline.main: Prosecutors: NY Man Willing to Sacrifice Self for Jihad
headline.print_headline: Prosecutors: NY Man Willing to Sacrifice Self for Jihad

lead_paragraph: A New York man was being held without bail on terrorism charges after federal authorities said he was prepared to strap on a bomb and sacrifice himself for jihad and persistently tried to join the Islamic State or another extremist group in Syria.
